short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures the serene beauty of a winter forest at sunset.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The landscape showcases trees adorned with frost, blending icy whites with a soft, warm glow of orange and pink hues in the background, creating a tranquil contrast. This extension brings a peaceful winter atmosphere to your browser, enhancing your browsing experience with the calming colors of a snowy forest bathed in the gentle light of dusk. Perfect for users who enjoy the quiet beauty of winter landscapes and the warmth of a winter sunset.
